meanings.definition: Materials that absorb liquids or gases.
meanings.sent1: The sorbents quickly soaked up the spilled water.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use sorbents to clean up oil spills in the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The sorbents in the lab seemed to have a thirst for any liquid they encountered.
meanings.sent4: The sorbents acted like tiny sponges, sucking in any moisture around them.
meanings.sent5: The sorbents were like thirsty little magnets for any liquid nearby.

meanings.definition: Substances that attract and hold other substances onto their surface.
meanings.sent1: The sorbents in the filter trapped all the impurities from the water.
meanings.sent2: These sorbents are great for removing odors from the air.
meanings.sent3: The sorbents in the kitchen seemed to have a magical ability to capture all the smells.
meanings.sent4: The sorbents clung onto the particles like tiny velcro strips.
meanings.sent5: The sorbents were like sticky paper, grabbing onto anything that came close.
